import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../../contexts/CartContext'; import { Trash2, Plus, Minus, ShoppingBag, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const Cart = () => { const { items, total, itemCount, updateQuantity, removeFromCart, clearCart } = useCart(); if (itemCount === 0) { return (

Looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet.

Start Shopping
); } return (

))}

Total ₹{(total + (total > 500 ? 0 : 50)).toFixed(2)}
Proceed to Checkout
Continue Shopping
); }; export default Cart;
